name: Turtle Blast - 2D Shooter | Android
description:
Turtle Blast is a casual shooter game that is about an angry turtle that wants to get revenge against the parrots! (Designed after my pet parrot Silver)

The turtle somehow found its way to a magical cannon that has wings, you will be flying through day and night while shooting the parrots using 3 different projectiles (Laser, Cannon Ball and Sound Waves)!

Don't forget to collect stars so you could change the way your turtle look and make your name known on the global leaderboard!

Features:

- Free Game!

- 3 Different projectiles

- 5 Different Enemies

- 3 Power ups

- 15+ Skins To Collect!

- You will be able to compete with your friends on the leaderboard!

- You will play as a turtle that FLIES

Hope you like the game! Updates will keep coming :)

PS, I'm not the best artist.. lol
